hero_headline: Your online presence shouldn't be a monthly bill.
hero_subheadline: Create an ultra-fast link page (⚡) with professional design and a single €5 lifetime payment.
problem_title: Why keep paying for a "Link Menu"?
problem_subtitle: Current tools have become slow and expensive:
problem_subscriptions_desc: Paying up to €24/month for a link list is excessive.
problem_speed_desc: Your followers leave if your page takes more than 2 seconds to load.
problem_noise_desc: Features you don't use that only distract your audience.
solution_subtitle: We've eliminated the noise to give you what really matters.
solution_speed_desc: Optimized to load in less than 500ms. Every millisecond gained is a follower not lost.
solution_privacy_desc: No third-party cookies or intrusive tracking. We respect your audience as much as you do.
solution_design_desc: Choose from 4 brutal themes designed to convert clicks, not to show off the platform.
solution_analytics_desc: In the Premium version, discover where your visits come from and which links perform best.
social_quote: "BioLinq is for those of us who prefer to spend our time creating content, not configuring complex tools."
social_speed_note: It's not magic, it's minimalist engineering.
final_cta_subtitle: Join the creators who have already left behind unnecessary subscriptions.
final_cta_note: Only €5 for lifetime Premium access. Limited launch offer.
